name: Frog Boy
description:
A challenging platformer where you play as a small frog boy, who is on an epic quest to retrieve his roommate's toilet plunger from the depths of the ocean! You will venture deeper and deeper down, collecting treasure and power-ups as you go, enhancing your body to better deal with the threats of the ocean.

IF YOU GET STUCK PRESS R to respawn at a checkpoint!

 The great plunger of legend!

Characters:

Frog Boy.

Jerry.

Controls:

Jump - W key or Space.

Move Left - A key.

Move Right - D key.

Power-ups:

Light - Passive.

Gives frog boy a passive light attached to his head, letting him see better underwater!

Dash - Shift key.

Gives frog boy the ability to quickly dash a small distance, handy for getting through hazardous areas!

Shoot - Left mouse click.

Gives frog boy the ability to shoot weaponized bubbles at his enemies!

Melee - Right mouse click.

Gives frog boy the ability to smack away enemy projectiles!

Enemies & Hazards:

Spikes.

A set of pointy points, an environmental hazard that will poke holes in your progress

  Cannon.

An autonomous cannon that will constantly fire at frog boy when he is within range, listen out for this hazard.

  Urchin.

A grumpy orb of spines that lives deep underwater, swimming around, not caring who it bumps into

Jellyfish.

An innocent jellyfish that is harmless, minding its own business. But you are mean and use them as bounce pads.

Angler Fish.

A greedy guppy that wants to make a meal out of you!

Boss?!?

Gonna need a bigger boat!
